page.title: 03THE LES QUENNEVAIS AREA
page.content: The area where I live is the Les Quennevais area. It is in the parish of St. Brelade. There are lots of things to do, most of my friends live in this area. The school I go to is in Les Quennevais estate which is where I live and it only takes me a few minutes to get there. There are lots of of shops, clothes shops, food shops, shoe shops, newsagents and others. There is a Community Centre which has a Youth club. I go to the Youth club and Majorettes. Lots of visitors and local people go to visit Belle Vue Pleasure Park, where they can ride on go-karts, play in the Games Room and use all the other amenities. There are playing fields and a cycle track, which people use during the week. In all, this is a nice area to live.
